snippet: A stray bullet hit a 10-year-old boy from Norway in a shooting in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, that otherwise seemed to have caused no panic.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on shooting in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, in which stray bullet hit a 10-year-old boy from Norway, with many in the neighborhood seeming to ignore the incident as it unfolded.
lead_paragraph: A stray bullet hit a 10-year-old boy from Norway in a shooting in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, that otherwise seemed to have caused no panic.

headline.seo: Noise of Shots Fired in Williamsburg Alarmed No One
headline.main: The Shots Sounded Like Fireworks, So Nobody in the Cafe Reacted
headline.print_headline: The Shots Sounded Like Fireworks, So Nobody in the Cafe Reacted
